mapper.insert: insert into answermodifyboard (uid, problemNo, uid_submitter,title, contents, regiTime) values(#{uid}, #{problemNo}, #{uid_submitter},#{title}, #{contents}, #{regiTime});
mapper.select: select articleNo, nickname, problemNo,title, regiTime from answermodifyboard amb join userinfo ui on amb.uid = ui.uid order by articleNo desc;

select articleNo, ui.nickname, problemNo, uns.nickname, title, contents, regiTime from answermodifyboard amb join userinfo ui join userinfo uis on amb.uid = ui.uid and amb.uid_submitter = uns.uid where articleNo = #{articleNo};
select articleNo, nickname, problemNo, title, regiTime from answermodifyboard amb join userinfo ui on amb.uid = ui.uid where title LIKE '%#{title}%'
select articleNo, nickname, problemNo, title, regiTime from answermodifyboard amb join userinfo ui on amb.uid = ui.uid where nickname = '#{nickname}';
select articleNo, nickname, problemNo, title, regiTime from answermodifyboard amb join userinfo ui on amb.uid = ui.uid where problemNo = #{problemNo}
